intro.headline: WhatsApp wasn't built for sales. We fixed that.
intro.description:
Your sales team lives in WhatsApp—80% of customer conversations happen there. But WhatsApp was designed for personal messaging, not professional sales. Conversations get lost. Handoffs fail. Managers fly blind.

Eazybe adds the features WhatsApp forgot: automatic backup, shared team inbox, CRM-style organization, scheduled messages, and AI that watches for at-risk deals. All without changing how your team works.

items.question: Do I need WhatsApp Business API?
items.answer: No. Eazybe works with personal WhatsApp, WhatsApp Business App, AND WhatsApp Business API. Unlike competitors that require expensive API migrations, we work with whatever WhatsApp you already use.

items.question: How does cloud backup work?
items.answer: Every message, attachment, and voice note is automatically synced to our secure cloud servers in real-time. Your data is encrypted in transit and at rest. You can search and access your entire conversation history anytime.

items.question: Can managers see all team conversations?
items.answer: Yes. The Team Inbox gives managers visibility into all team WhatsApp conversations without requiring screen sharing or accessing personal phones. Filter by rep, time period, or search across all conversations.

items.question: How does this work with my CRM?
items.answer: Eazybe connects to HubSpot, Salesforce, Zoho, and other CRMs via OAuth. Conversations sync automatically to contacts and deals. You can also view CRM data directly in WhatsApp via our mini CRM sidebar.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Yes. SOC 2 Type II certified, GDPR compliant, official Meta Business Partner. Messages are encrypted in transit and at rest. We're used by healthcare, finance, and government customers.

items.question: What's included in the free trial?
items.answer: Full access to all Starter plan features for 14 days. No credit card required. Cancel anytime.
